author: Edward Roberts
title: Saturday Night Takeaway is back - here are the most shocking moments of last series
text:
Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
There's not long to wait now - Ant and Dec's Saturday Night Takeaway is BACK this weekend. 
It's been a long 10 months since the show last appeared on our screens to brighten the nation's Saturday evenings, and everyone will be excited to watch its big return. 
There'll be some changes for the new series, with Scarlett Moffatt joining her fellow Geordies as she takes over Ashley Roberts' role on the show, and she's described it as a "dream come true". Scarlett Moffatt will join Ant and Dec for Saturday Night Takeaway (Photo: Instagram/scarlett_moffatt) 
She gushed: "Being part of the ITV family is amazing. Some of my favourite memories are being at home belly laughing with the family watching Saturday Night Takeaway. Knowing Iâ€™m part of that is overwhelming." 
So what can fans expect from the upcoming run? Well, if these moments from the last series are anything to go by, it seems ANYTHING can happen... Dec's wedding ring
